parameters.name: Keyword
parameters.description: The keyword that is used to search for Logstore groups.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The page number.

Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page.

Minimum value: 1. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: SLSGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the Logstore group.
